Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Set in Space

Bingo Square [5]

A book that takes place primarily (at least 50%) off planet. IE: on a spaceship, space station, asteroid, space whale, free floating in space, etc. HARD MODE: Characters are not originally from Earth. It is acceptable for the characters to be descendants of Earthlings as long as they are not themselves from Earth.

Title Author Hard Mode
A Desolation Called Peace Arkady Martine
Across the Universe Beth Revis
Across the Void S.K. Vaughn
An Unkindness of Ghosts Rivers Solomon
Ancestral Night Elizabeth Bear
Ancillary Mercy Ann Leckie
Ancillary Sword Ann Leckie
Artemis Andy Weir
Artifact Space Miles Cameron
Aurora Kim Stanley Robinson
Binti Nnedi Okorafor
Blindsight Peter Watts
Bluebird Ciel Pierlot
Children of Time Adrian Tchaikovsky
Chilling Effect Valerie Valdes
Dawn Octavia E. Butler
Dim Stars: A Novel of Outer-Space Shenanigans Brian P. Rubin
Downbelow Station C.J. Cherryh
Echoes of the Ancients Isabel Pelech
Ender's Game Orson Scott Card
Escaping Exodus Nicky Drayden
Excession Iain M. Banks
Falling Free Lois McMaster Bujold
Far From the Light of Heaven Tade Thompson
First Sister Linden A. Lewis
Gateway Frederik Pohl
Harrow the Ninth Tamsyn Muir
Illuminae Amie Kaufman and Jay Kristoff
Lightless C.A. Higgens
Look to Windward Iain M. Banks
Machine Elizabeth Bear
Merchanter's Luck C.J. Cherryh
Network Effect Martha Wells
Ninefox Gambit Yoon Ha Lee
Out of the Silent Planet C.S. Lewis
Prodigy Jan Clark
Project Hail Mary Andy Weir
Pushing Ice Alastair Reynolds
Record of a Spaceborn Few Becky Chambers
Red Dust Yoss
Rendezvous with Rama Arthur C. Clarke
Rimrunners C.J. Cherryh
Saturn Run John Stanford and Ctein
Sisters of the Vast Black Lina Rather
Space Opera Catherynne M. Valente
Space Unicorn Blues TJ Berry
Superluminal Vonda Mcintyre
The Dark Beyond the Stars Frank M. Robinson
The Darkness Outside Us Eliot Schrefer
The Expanse James S.A. Corey

The Fuse Antony Johnston & Justin Greenwood

The Last Astronaut David Wellington
The Last Dance Martin Shoemaker

The Relentless Moon Mary Robinette Kowal
The Shadows of Dust Alec Hutson
The Ship Who Searched Anne McCaffrey and Mercedes Lackey
The Starlight Crystal Christopher Pike

The Tea Master and the Detective Aliette de Bodard
The Vanished Birds Simon Jimenez
